content.title: Jack Builds a Techbase
content.author: Xulgonoth & Benchy
content.buildtime: A Friday or two (about 10 months in total)
content.textfile:
===========================================================================
Advanced engine needed  : MBF21-compatible
Primary purpose         : Single play
===========================================================================
Title                   : Jack Builds a Techbase
Filename                : jbat.wad
Release date            : 2023-06-27
Author                  : Xulgonoth & Benchy
Email Address           : [redacted]
Other Files By Author   : X: Gateway to Shangri-La, Sanguine Cybermancy,
                             Mayhem 2022 MAP31, Not Even Remotely Fair MAP07,
     Poogers MAP30
                          B: Not a Joke Pack 1.1, Apogee, Rock Bunker,
     30 Monsters Community Project MAP49,
     Not Even Remotely Fair - maps 02, 12, 16, 20, 21
                             and 23
Misc. Author Info       : Two troglodytes finally finishing their map

Description             : 4-maps-worth of abusive gameplay

Additional Credits to   : See "Credits" file
===========================================================================
* What is included *

New levels              : 4 (+ epilogue)
Sounds                  : Yes
Music                   : Yes
Graphics                : Yes
Dehacked/BEX Patch      : Yes
Demos                   : No
Other                   : Yes
Other files required    : None


* Play Information *

Game                    : Doom 2
Map #                   : MAP01-03, MAP31
Single Player           : Designed for
Cooperative 2-4 Player  : No
Deathmatch 2-4 Player   : No
Other game styles       : None
Difficulty Settings     : Yes


* Construction *

Base                    : New from scratch
Build Time              : A Friday or two (about 10 months in total)
Editor(s) used          : Ultimate Doom Builder, Slade
Known Bugs              : https://www.insectidentification.org/true-bugs.php
May Not Run With        : Anything that doesn't support MBF21
Tested With             : DSDA-Doom v0.25.6 -cl21

* Where to get the file that this text file describes *

The Usual: ftp://archives.gamers.org/pub/idgames/ and mirrors
